entry.title: Saturday night: Showers at times heavy. Low 7.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with showers at times heavy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming southwest 20 then light after midnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 6:21 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
